Name: Nuts Space Shooter
About the game: Nuts Space Shooter is a 2D, horizontally scrolling shooter, where you play as one of the eight pilots with unique abilities and ships. Fight your way through endless Patrol mode and nine handcrafted missions. Use various bonuses obtainable during fight or just before to your advantage. Extend your pilots capabilities with eighteen unique feats.
